msg: HDFS-2889. getNumCurrentReplicas is package private but should be public on 0.23 (see HDFS-2408). Contributed by Gregory Chanan.

author: vinodkv
msg: MAPREDUCE-3711. Fixed MR AM recovery so that only single selected task output is recovered and thus reduce the unnecessarily bloated recovery time. Contributed by Robert Joseph Evans.
